faq.question: How to book an appointment?
faq.answer: ğŸ“… You can book an appointment online here: https://acutherapy.janeapp.com or call us at (808) 528-7177.

faq.question: Clinic hours
faq.answer: ğŸ•’ Our clinic hours are: Mondayâ€“Saturday 9:00 AM â€“ 1:00 PM.

faq.question: Clinic location
faq.answer: ğŸ“ Main clinic: 1650 Liliha St, Suite 208, Honolulu. Free parking available.

faq.question: Pricing information
faq.answer: ğŸ’µ Most sessions range between $85â€“$180 depending on insurance.

faq.question: Parking information
faq.answer: ğŸš— Free parking at both clinics. Liliha = private lot. Aiea = plaza parking.

faq.question: Available services
faq.answer: ğŸ“‹ We offer acupuncture, cupping, massage, and holistic rehab.

faq.question: Do you treat back pain?
faq.answer: ğŸ’Š We treat lower/upper back pain, chronic pain, sciatica, and tension. Call (808) 528-7177.

faq.question: Does acupuncture hurt?
faq.answer: ğŸ¤” Most patients feel only a tiny pinch. Many find it relaxing.

faq.question: Accepted insurance
faq.answer: ğŸ’° We accept Auto, Workers Comp, HMSA, Kaiser, UHA, VA, TriWest. Call us to confirm.

faq.question: Who are the doctors?
faq.answer: ğŸ‘¨â€âš•ï¸ Our licensed acupuncturists have 30+ years of experience.
